issue.title: Set custom path for output
issue.body: Now the path to .nyc_output is not configurable. Is it possible to add support for this? For example if I need to generate raw data to the different path. Example /user/home/project/folder/.nyc_output

comment.body:
Coverage simply not working with wrong paths.
For example I need to replace `.nyc_output/js -> dist`

issue.title: Use source maps
issue.body:
Hi,

I don't really understand how this package works so I apologise in advance if this isn't the right place to make this question.

On my project, the code that reaches the browser is processed by babel. The final code has source maps that google chrome uses to show the original source when I open the dev tools. However the puppeteer coverage information of a file shows the processed source code, not the original. Is there a way to convert the `text` and `ranges` fields of the coverage object to the original source and line numbers?

Thank you for your antention

comment.body: @bcoe could you please help, I see that puppeteer to Istanbul use v8 to istanbul under the hood. How to map coverage to the original source?

pull_request.title: Version updates
pull_request.body: The main update is for [v8-to-istanbul](https://npmjs.com/v8-to-istanbul), which now supports source maps.

comment.body:
Change will be reflected in the `out.json` because of `jsonPart` is closure variable in top scope. But the coverage records will be repeated writes over and over again (just as `puppeteerToV8Info.length` times).

I have fixed this problem with latest commit and added test case.

Thanks for reminder.

comment.body: Every Page instance would generate a new `puppeteerFormat`. How could we merge multiple puppeteerFormat data?
